definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="File" id="file">file</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">you_are.plfile</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="file_exists"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field></block></statement><next><block type="write_txt"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><statement name="text"><block type="write_line"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="text"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="newLine"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
